item.title: Ctet December 2024
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Central Teacher Eligibility Test CTET December 2024 Central Teacher Eligibility Test CTET December 2024 Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE) Short Details of Notification CTET December 2024 Exam : Important Dates Application Begin : 17/09/2024Last Date for Registration : 16/10/2024Last Date Fee Payment : 16/10/2024Correction Date: 21-25 October 2024CTET Exam Date : 14-15 December 2024Exam City Available : 03/12/2024Admit Card Available : 12/12/2024Answer Key Available : 01/01/2025Result Declared : 09/01/2025 Application Fee For Single Paper :General / OBC / EWS: 1000/-SC / ST / PH : 500/-For Both Paper Primary / Junior :General / OBC / EWS: 1200/-SC / ST / PH : 600/-Pay the Examination Fee Through Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking or E Challan Eligibility CTET Primary Level (Class I to V): Eligibility with Code December 2024 Age relaxation as per rules of CTET December 2024 Exam :.
